name: Monochromatic demo
description:
A sidescroller RPG maker game of...decent quality.

Very,very,VERY HEAVILY IN DEVELOPMENT.

This is a game about a dull girl who remained enclosed and is without imagination. After she had gotten into an accident,her death was inevitable. But people had taken an interest to her and decided to explore her mindset before she perished.

I made this in 3 days help
